hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: Backend_branch
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Enter the name of the Backend branch

flow-definition.script:
// Manually pulled from git based on configurations pipeline { agent { node { label 'build_slave' } } environment { BUILD_NAME = "Build Python Tar" NOTIFYUSERS = 'kavyasrim@newtglobalcorp.com' BUILD_DETAILS = "
Job Name: ${env.JOB_NAME}
Build Number: ${env.BUILD_NUMBER}
Build URL: ${BUILD_URL}" } tools { nodejs "nodejs" } parameters { string(name: 'Backend_branch', defaultValue: 'Developer', description: 'Enter the name of the Backend branch') } options { timestamps() timeout(time: 12, unit: 'HOURS') buildDiscarder(logRotator(numToKeepStr: '10')) } stages { stage ("Checkout Code") { steps { deleteDir() dir("Backend"){ deleteDir() echo "Checkout the Backend code" git branch: "${params.Backend_branch}", credentialsId: 'Kavya_1709', url: 'https://github.com/newtglobalgit/DMAP_Backend.git' } } } stage ("Backend Build") { steps { dir("Backend") { echo "Running Bandit" sh "bandit -r ./ -x ./Deploy -ll -f csv -o PythonBanditAnalysisReport.csv || true" } } } } post { always { emailext attachmentsPattern: '', subject: "Jenkins Job Report For ${BUILD_NAME} - ${currentBuild.currentResult}", body: "BUILD DETAILS: ${BUILD_DETAILS}
BUILD STATUS: ${currentBuild.currentResult}", to: "${NOTIFYUSERS}" } }}
